name: NutritionEncountersHCPCS
title: Nutrition Encounters HCPCS
purpose: (Clinical Focus: These encounter codes represent interventions by a food and nutrition professional.),(Data Element Scope: Codes included represent nutrition encounters provided for individual or groups by a food and nutrition professional.),(Inclusion Criteria: Data elements represent specific interventions provided by a food and nutrition professional.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes that are not HCPCS for food and nutrition professionals.)
